statements: SELECT * FROM research_publications
SELECT publication_title, authors, publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE publication_topic = 'Machine Learning'
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT publication_title, authors, publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE publication_citation_count > 100 ORDER BY publication_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_publications FROM research_publications
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT publication_title, authors FROM research_publications WHERE publication_citation_count > 100 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, publication_title, publication_topic FROM research_publications WHERE authors LIKE '%John%' OR authors LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT publication_title, publication_citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publication_citation_count DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_publications, AVG(publication_citation_count) AS avg_citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE publication_topic = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM literature WHERE literature_type = 'Novel';
SELECT author, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, publication_date FROM literature WHERE author = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM publications WHERE title LIKE '%Mystery%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT title, author FROM literature WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT publication_id, title FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total FROM publications GROUP BY author HAVING total > 1;
SELECT * FROM literature WHERE author='Jane Smith' AND literature_type='Novel';
SELECT * FROM research_publications;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM research_publications;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE publication_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;

SELECT publication_title, topic_name FROM research_publications JOIN publication_topics ON research_publications.publication_id = publication_topics.publication_id JOIN research_topics ON publication_topics.topic_id = research_topics.topic_id;
SELECT publication_id, publication_title, publication_author, publication_date FROM research_publications;
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT research_topics.topic_name, research_publications.publication_title FROM research_topics INNER JOIN publication_topics ON research_topics.topic_id = publication_topics.topic_id INNER JOIN research_publications ON publication_topics.publication_id = research_publications.publication_id;
SELECT publication_id, publication_title FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM publications WHERE citation_count > 100;
SELECT author, publication_date, journal FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, journal, publication_date FROM publications WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, journal FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as total_publications FROM publications GROUP BY author;
SELECT p.title, a.name FROM publications p JOIN authors a ON p.author=a.name;
SELECT p.title, t.topic_name FROM publications p JOIN publication_topic pt ON p.id=pt.publication_id JOIN topics t ON pt.topic_id=t.id;
SELECT * FROM research_publications;
SELECT publication_id, author_name, publication_title FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, publication_title FROM research_publications ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT publication_id, author_name, publication_title, publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT publication_id, publication_title, keyword FROM research_publications JOIN publications_keywords ON research_publications.publication_id = publications_keywords.publication_id JOIN keywords ON publications_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id;
SELECT * FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC, author_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(publication_id) AS publication_count FROM research_publications GROUP BY author_name HAVING publication_count > 1 ORDER BY publication_count DESC;
SELECT publication_title, author_name FROM research_publications JOIN authors ON research_publications.author_name = authors.author_name WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors LEFT JOIN research_publications ON authors.author_name = research_publications.author_name WHERE publication_date < '2019-01-01';

SELECT keyword, COUNT(publication_id) AS publication_count FROM publications_keywords JOIN keywords ON publications_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY publication_count DESC LIMIT 5;
